data.message: Really Facebook don't push gay on us.

replies.message: No one's pushing anything on you, they're just expressing an opinion that they support.
How is gays being accepted affecting you david !? I mean seriously come on who the hell would be interested in david the flower

how is it affecting us , Yesterday a law passed in california that forces school kids to allow transexual students to use the bathroom of their choice. And if a straight student complains or voices his or her discust ! they can be charged with a hate crime.  Thats how it is affecting us you bunch of liberal sheep . You are all out of your ignorant little minds.

And it will not end here , These animals with no self respect or souls will keep pushing and pushing .  their pot soaked infected minds hold no  love of country or heritage. It will only get worse until the majority finally becomes so outraged that we march in the streets and put a stop to this perversion of our country by FORCE.
You are right Gary, but I wouldn't go so far (with the force)
What else will work Elias! The people of california twice voted against gay marraige and some liberal judge overturned the will of the people.  You tell me ? What else is there .
Land of the free eh... unless you're gay that is.
